attributes.action: Allow the Police more powers to investigate local government corruption
attributes.background: Following some ongoing development plans for some of my city's parks its been rumored that lead Councillors have business and family links with the developer. This strikes me as a conflict of interest, bordering on corruption, i'd like the police to have more scope to investigate further.

rejection.details: You may wish to submit a further petition setting out exactly which additional powers you would like the police to be given.
